In England, in the seven days to 07 September, there were 193,771 new confirmed cases (342.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 August, there were 171,969 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 13% (21,802 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 September is 6,197,654 (10,959.6 cases per 100,000 population).
